title: Baal-hanan
html: BAAL-HANAN(Baʹal-haʹnan) [Baal Has Shown Favor; Baal Is Gracious].1. Son of Achbor; the seventh of eight kings of Edom who ruled “before any king reigned over the sons of Israel.”—Ge 36:31, 38, 39; 1Ch 1:49, 50.2. The Gederite whom David made chief “over the olive groves and the sycamore trees that were in the Shephelah.”—1Ch 27:28, 31.
